welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Barwell, a charming town in the heart of England known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited access in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport is designated for low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport is designated for international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport terminal for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
